about_the_game:
You are a data snatcher hired by an AI from the future. You will be placed in a certain area to gather important data. Each snatcher possesses action and passive skills that can be used to achieve their goal. Compete with each other and help the AI obtain human-interacted data.

King of Snatchers is a story-driven local multiplayer snatching party game where players will try to complete an investigative quest for an AI. It is a 2-4 players party game focused on couch interactions. Through this gaming platform, the AI will be able to gather data regarding a catastrophe set to happen in the future. Players will be asked to play a snatching game in a place of interest where the information will lead to the catastrophe's cause.

With the use of your controller, attain the title King of Snatchers by competing with snatchers to complete various snatching games requested by the AI. Depending on the game mode, each player must knock other players to snatch the data, verify it, and lead the investigation. Outwit your competition during special party games to achieve progress.

SNATCH ARENA

Take hold of the data until the timer runs out. Players compete by using weapons to prevent other players from snatching the data. When the timer is zero, the player with the data wins the round.

SNATCH & RUN

Snatch the data and take it to the end of the level. The player who successfully exits the level with the data will win the round.

AIR SNATCH

Fly and snatch the data from other players, then take it to the end of the level. Watch out for obstacles to win the round.

AIR STREAK

Fly and achieve the longest streak by going through the obstacle. The player with the longest streak wins.

SECRET DATA

Each player inputs their secret data depending on the prompt at the beginning of the round. Players defend their data while exposing other players' secrets. When time runs out, the player with the exposed data will be shown on the screen.

VERIFY GAME

Identify a secret word by asking categorical questions. Players can team up in local battles.

Local Multiplayer

Play against each other in a local couch setting. Compete to take the data and help AI in its quest. A minimum of 2 players is required and best played with 4 players. Players may use Steam Remote Play or other external remote app for online play.

Story Mode

Solve a future problem by knowing what happened in a place of interest. Have fun while helping the future of humanity. The AI will give players certain areas to investigate. Areas will have data to be gathered.

Controller-based

While most of the game is played using a controller, some game modes will still require a keyboard to input data.


Will you become the King of Snatchers and rule the flow of information? Or will you be crushed by competition and let others achieve glory? Join the Data Snatchers and win the future.
